CREATE TABLE email_marketing_lists (
    customer_id INT,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    behavior VARCHAR(255),
    interests VARCHAR(255)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_history JSON,
    visit_count INT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 35 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
